name: Tenebra - Best Rpg Openworld
description:
hello gamer ... this is a project in italian AND english language of the best rpg 2d for android, windows and linux... actually the demo for testing is only for windows and android it's for testing compatibility... on game you can craft skill, upgrade single stats of armor, weapon and accessory!

15 april 2020 full game...
